name: Driven Chain Conveyor
description:
for transportation of empty and filled gas bottles.
total length is approx. 60 m
2-storied, 2 strands, track trace 180/320mm with wear stripes,
consists of:
- straght pices with wear stripes, made of plastic,
partially with railings;
- 5 x curve 90° with railings and wear stripes;
- 1 x curve 30° with railings and wear stripes;
- 1 x drive stration 230/400 V;
- 2 x combistation 230/400V;
- 1 x chain turn-over station;
- approx. 250m chains;
- supporting stands and railings;
- bottles end stop (for filled bottles)
